title: House of 1000 Corpses / The Devil's Rejects
content:
Can anyone ID this font of the 2 Rob Zombie Movies "House Of 1000 Corpses" and "The Devil's Rejects" ?

[House Of 1000 Corpses](http://web.archive.org/web/20131012060033/http:/upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/en/thumb/7/7d/House_of_1000_Corpses_poster.JPG/398px-House_of_1000_Corpses_poster.JPG)  
 [The Devil's Rejects](http://web.archive.org/web/20131012060033/http:/ecx.images-amazon.com/images/I/51pyp--rn1L.jpg)

Thanx
author: In Konfrontation

comments.content:
Seems to be pretty close to Iconian Fonts [National Express](http://web.archive.org/web/20131012060033/http:/www.dafont.com/national-express.font?nb_ppp=50&text=REJECTS), which is similar to some Trekkie-based font, apparently (see [Starfleet](http://web.archive.org/web/20131012060033/http:/www.dafont.com/starfleet.font?nb_ppp=50&text=REJECTS) and [Federation Classic](http://web.archive.org/web/20131012060033/http:/www.dafont.com/federation-classic.font?nb_ppp=50&text=REJECTS))

Some stretching and a few tweaks to the outlines and you're there.

- Mike Yanega
